mapper.select:
SELECT A.ANIMALPK, A.ANIMAL_NM, A.ANIMAL_BDATE, A.ANIMAL_SPECIES, A.ANIMAL_BREED, A.ANIMAL_WEIGHT, A.ANIMAL_SEX, A.ANIMAL_NEUT, M.MASTER_NM, M.MASTER_PNUMBER, M.MASTER_ADDRESS, M.MASTER_EMAIL FROM ANIMAL_TEST A LEFT OUTER JOIN MASTER_TEST M ON A.MASTERPK = M.MASTERPK where 1=1 AND master_nm=#{master_nm}
AND master_nm LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND animal_nm LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND 1=1
AND A.ANIMAL_SPECIES LIKE '%강아지%'
AND A.ANIMAL_SPECIES LIKE '%고양이%'
AND A.ANIMAL_SPECIES NOT IN ('고양이','강아지')
order by A.animalPk desc

SELECT A.ANIMALPK, A.ANIMAL_NM, A.ANIMAL_BDATE, A.ANIMAL_SPECIES, A.ANIMAL_BREED, A.ANIMAL_WEIGHT, A.ANIMAL_SEX, A.ANIMAL_NEUT, M.MASTER_NM, M.MASTER_PNUMBER, M.MASTER_ADDRESS, M.MASTER_EMAIL FROM ANIMAL_TEST A LEFT OUTER JOIN MASTER_TEST M ON A.MASTERPK = M.MASTERPK where 1=1 AND A.ANIMALPK=#{animalPk} order by A.ANIMALPK desc
SELECT A.ANIMAL_NM, C.* FROM ANIMAL_TEST A JOIN MASTER_TEST M ON A.MASTERPK = M.MASTERPK JOIN BOOKING_TEST C ON A.ANIMALPK = C.ANIMALPK where A.ANIMALPK = #{animalPk}

select b.booking_date from booking_test b left outer join booking_test on b.booking_date = b.booking_date where booking_date >= to_date(#{currentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and animalPk = #{animalPk} order by booking_date desc fetch first 1 row only
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal_test( ANIMALPK, ANIMAL_NM, ANIMAL_BDATE, ANIMAL_SPECIES, ANIMAL_BREED, ANIMAL_WEIGHT, ANIMAL_SEX, ANIMAL_NEUT, MASTERPK ) VALUES( ANIMAL_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{animal_Nm}, #{animal_bdate}, #{animal_species}, #{animal_breed}, #{animal_weight}, #{animal_sex}, #{animal_neut}, #{masterPk} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ANIMAL_TEST SET ANIMAL_NM = #{animal_nm}, ANIMAL_BDATE = #{animal_bdate}, ANIMAL_SPECIES = #{animal_species}, ANIMAL_BREED = #{animal_breed}, ANIMAL_WEIGHT = #{animal_weight}, ANIMAL_SEX = #{animal_sex}, ANIMAL_NEUT = #{animal_neut} WHERE ANIMALPK = #{animalPk}
mapper.select: SELECT MASTERPK, MASTER_NM, MASTER_EMAIL, MASTER_PNUMBER, MASTER_ADDRESS, ANIMAL_NM, ANIMAL_SPECIES, ANIMAL_BREED, ANIMAL_WEIGHT, ANIMAL_SEX, ANIMAL_NEUT FROM ANIMAL_TEST WHERE MASTERPK = #{masterPk}
